title: Hi everyone, My Google pixel 4 brightness is still too bright for me at night, what can I do?
content:
I've tried with adaptive brightness switched on and off (doesn't seem to make a difference).
I also have nightlight turned on and the screen is switched to night mode.
Wouldn't be such a big deal but I have a 4 month old and like to do my Duolingo etc. during the night feeds but I think the bright screen can dazzle him!
Thanks in advance for your help ðŸ™‚
